entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 02:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -23.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -27.3°C
Wind: WNW 30 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 13 in the evening then steady.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 13 in the evening then steady. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
